GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.30 to before v4.9.337
GSD.description:
mtd: Fix device name leak when register device failed in add_mtd_device()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit a75f45afa932bfb24a2603ebcea5efd2e7cdcfd6, it was introduced in version v2.6.30 by commit 1f24b5a8ecbb2a3c7080f418974d40e3ffedb221. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mtd: Fix device name leak when register device failed in add_mtd_device()
OSV.details:
